laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for M. bovis resistant to isoniazid, rifampin, pyrazinamide, ethambutol, streptomycin, para-aminosalicylic acid, clarithromycin, cycloserine, ethionamide, ofloxacin, capreomycin, and amikacin.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Demonstrated a change from positive to negative.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Hematocrit: 31%, Mean corpuscular volume: 86 mm3, WBC count: 5300 cells/mm3 (68% neutrophils, 26% lymphocytes, and 6% monocytes), Platelet count: 291,000 cells/mm3.
